title: Recently Updated 2BD/1BA Apartment
posting_body: ['Attention all renters!', 'Are you ready for a different renting experience?', 'Where you will receive a hands-on approach and personal attention from your landlord?', 'If so, you have come to the right place!', 'Welcome to 445 Fairmount Ave. #A!', 'A quiet, single building with only 2 units, where your landlord owns and manages the property.', 'Days of your maintenance requests sitting untouched are over.', 'Here, your needs and requests will be met in a timely manner.', "Now let's take a deeper dive into the unit.", '445A is a large recently updated 2 bedroom/ 1 bath, 2nd floor apartment with bamboo flooring, new paint, washer/dryer and plenty of closet space!', 'The full kitchen with breakfast counter, opens to a large living area with ceiling fan, tons of windows and lots of natural light.', 'The two bedrooms are separated by the full bathroom.', 'The Northern Liberties neighborhood has a plethora of dining options, nightlife, gyms, local shopping and parks!', 'With its close proximity to the Delaware River trail, public transportation and the highways, commuting and exercise options are convenient!', 'So, what are you waiting for?', 'Come see this great unit today!']
